ygData.subject: Re: Guild Matters
ygData.msgSnippet: Since I m bored and so many tulan with EQ, here s another Avanguardia de Velorian event that might be hell if there s enought support....... Spectre hunt in
ygData.messageBody:
Since I'm bored and so many tulan with EQ, here's another Avanguardia de
Velorian event that might be hell if there's enought support.......

Spectre hunt in OOT! The 4 specs there is part of a cleric/paladin quest
to get the deepwater harpoon. Can run about, kill them quest etc.....

Alex wrote:

> I have not been playing for 3 days. I did notice the excitement we
> once had b4 is not there no more. partly the game is not as
> interesting anymore.these r just thoughts. i didnt think them thru .
> just jot it down as it comes to mind. no spell checks too.1) Lvling
> and lvling , nothing but just lvling.....sux.2) questing is much more
> interesting(personal perference).i think with a small group is even
> better.3) I dun mind NOT lvling sometimes. , I enjoy beening able to
> PL some of u guys at mobs. its fun in group of local kakis. no xp..
> big deal :P4) I have group with Galarion, Kailli, Avengeline and Kalli
> at lake. I hope to group again with them.But my nite game timely sux.
> long time ago...was with Leshrec , Zandaerion adn the gang.....5) I
> make friends with other guild and indiviuals...enemies too.. lol. I
> get invits to some guild grouping at times.6) Guild outing , i
> suggest should be a quest or specific mob target, LOWER (blue) for
> most so it doent become corpse retriveing excerise. Whats the point ?
> low blue? propbaly items got already? well. the point is we do things
> together. pass the stuff to lower level, sell them whatever.hell,
> start a guild war!. Just enjoy.7) wanna hit 50th lvl? now at 35th..
> hey . spend another 6 months lor. if not what to do?( see above)8) i
> enjoy lvl 15th to 25th the most. why?9) will all of us be around EQ 6
> months from now? some. prob. 50%. maybe less10) Im waiting for a cool
> new on-line game. pull some of u guys along. We need new refreshing
> STUFF!11) one day...... Im nerfing EQ. and u know what? im NOT
> patching it. BiBi .,...going out of his mind..... psss.. Sereph what
> the hell im going to do with 600 bottles of beer in my bank ! ?? :P
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Synzzz <hannibal@...>
> To: SG-EverQuest <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> Date: Wednesday, October 13, 1999 9:21 PM
> Subject: [sg-everquest] Guild Matters
> Hello all, I think it's time something is done about our
> guild. We either need more ppl or we need more guild
> events.Probably the former.Problem is Ziltus and Leshrec no
> longer play their wizards. Fesse is also semi retired.I
> already have problems finding ppl to group with as it has
> been last few weeks. Also we dont seem to havemuch of an
> enthusiasm. No offence but i think some things need fixing.
> Or maybe i'm the only one feeling it hmm... Unlike a few
> guilds i've come to know...we really haven't had much of a
> union as a guild. Lvls pobably play onepart as it prevents
> effective guild outings. Other is we seem to have bad luck
> with any so far hehe. I'd like and hope to see something
> good that can be done for us all...if not maybe one day i
> might just leave..no offence i like you guys but i need to
> be able to have some fun too..it's hardly fun anymore now
> for me.I'll still be on mailing list if i ever leave and i
> will still give my best at providing any info that no one
> might haveor help if i ever can... Of course that's only if
> i leave (which is unlikely) but i'd thought i just bring it
> up to you all to be fair...Thaks for your time Zanderion
> Stormseekerlvl 36 mage and yes double xp penalty for dying
> after every hell lvl...ARGH!just found that out when one
> whole bubble disappeared
>
